data.name: Cave Guesser
data.detailed_description:
You are just taking a walk outside your cave, through the jungle, when you see something interesting... but you can't remember the word!

Luckily, in your village, there's a cave full of smart people - the Cave Guessers! Surely they will know the word. So you hurry back and describe what you have seen - and quench your thirst for knowledge while they guess the word!

Cave Guessers is a casual fun party word guessing game for 2-16 players. Every turn, one player gets a word. They then describe that word using abstract concepts, while the other players guess what the word could be! The faster someone guesses a word, the more points are rewarded!

data.short_description: Cave Guessers is a casual word guessing game for 2-16 players. Every turn, one player gets a word. They then describe that word using abstract concepts, while the other players guess what the word could be! The faster someone guesses a word, the more points are rewarded!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support, 1.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
